scripts.build: tsc -b && vite build && mv '../devtools Extension/Resources/index.html' '../devtools Extension/Resources/popup.html' && vite build --config vite.content.config.ts && vite build --config vite.inject.config.ts
scripts.build:content: vite build --config vite.content.config.ts && vite build --config vite.inject.config.ts
